column5: Guys the Walleye are here but its a weird bite ...put in your time move around day to day try new areas seems to be the drop offs from 9 to 14 fow ...I use a tiny buck shot on 1 rod with a big minnow dead stick other rod use a big buck shot or macho minnow jigs with 2 to 3 small shinners tipped on your 3 prong hook...work the bottom slow rise up about a 1ft pause wait 30 sec drop back to the bottom if you feel weight on the next rise set the hook ....they will hit on the drop or on the pause ...  Ice is 5 to 8" see ya out there Fishmaster
thanks for the heads up steve! hope to be out soon!
Awesome report, THanks! Now lets just hope this warm weather and rain doesnt wash away all the ice this weekend....

I think we will be ok we have been on the ice for 2 weeks now with the last warm front we had for 4 days of straight rain it held in  ...this will add a little more current and like that ...warm fronts turn on fish and  I will be out
Thanks for the update Steve.  Good ice out there hope it last's, I want to try again down there this year.
I have never fished the Grand before.  What area are you in Fishmaster?  Any help would be appreciated!!  Thanks a lot!
We are fishing bellow the dunnville dam about 1 mile down river ...Google Fishmaster im sure you will find me ...
